#summary Maven configuration
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

*Dependency*

{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.samaxes.securetag</groupId>
    <artifactId>securetag</artifactId>
    <version>1.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}

*Repository*

Be up to date, add the following to your `pom.xml` for the most recent version:

{{{
<project>
    ...
    <repositories>
        ...
        <repository>
            <id>googlecode-releases</id>
            <name>Google Code Maven repository of releases</name>
            <url>http://maven-samaxes-repo.googlecode.com/svn/releases</url>
        </repository>
        ...
    </repositories>
    ...
</project>
}}}
